short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopping Cart contents import into Slingshot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Shopping Cart Import extension allows you to shop on a supplier site and import lines from the supplierâ€™s shopping cart into a Slingshot requisition. This functionality does not require a formal agreement with the supplier and is no limited to suppliers providing Punch out support.
Unlike Punch out, there is no automatic communication with the supplier. The user is required to complete the order on the suppliers web site (check out) after the Slingshot requisition has been approved.
